data.title: Law firm and lawyer rankings from The Legal 500 Europe, Middle East & Africa guide
data.meta_description: Market-leading rankings and editorial commentary - see the top law firms & lawyers for Employment in Denmark
data.text:
‘Sandro Ratkovic is outstanding as a strategic legal adviser. He is clearly one of the best in Denmark in employment law and he has a unique talent for providing business focused legal advise in a clear and timely manner.’

‘Morten Ulrich is an expect in his field. He has great experience and is an excellent litigator, with an overview of all the details of a case and superb judgment.’

‘Bech-Bruun is unique because it is a highly professional and modern law firm. Due to the size and the technical resources of the Bech Bruun, the firm is able to provide specialist knowledge from all areas of law – we therefore feel that we are in very safe hands with our collaboration.’

‘We highly recommend Lise Lauridsen with whom we have a long-standing relationship. We have used the brilliant services of Lise for several years and appreciate her highly qualified expertise, her efficiency and her dedication to our company.’

‘Bech-Bruun’s employment law practice delivers their assistance with an attention to detail while keeping the eye on the ball and with an uncompromising understanding of the need for practical and pragmatic use of their advice. The advice is delivered with the appropriate sense of urgency and an in-depth knowledge of the legal details across the entire team that gives confidence that you always receive the best advice.’

‘Sandro Ratkovic’s practical experience and wide knowledge of both national and international employment law in combination with being forthcoming and readily available to meet our needs is not often found. His advice is direct and to the point and gives an impression that no stones are left unturned.’

‘Morten Ulrich has lots of experience and knowledge. Very good at building up the defence, and processing in court.’

‘Lise Lauridsen is the top employment lawyer in Denmark. She is extremely knowledgeable and has a very practical touch, making her expert advice and support invaluable to clients. Sandro Ratkovic is a great lawyer, always available, providing invaluable support at all times.’

‘The team is amazingly responsive. It is efficient and regardless of the time difference, there is an answer within hours.’

‘Jacob Sand is just amazing. He knows what he is talking about. Ditte Grundtvig Larsen is very good too; smart, responsive and efficient.’

‘Ditte Grundtvig Larsen is unique as she always delivers practical advice of a high-value and never shies away from challenging the client. She is very experienced within internal investigations and whistle-blower cases.’

‘Jacob Sand has in-depth knowledge of EU law and is second to none in Denmark in this field.’

‘The team is one of the best in Denmark. They provide pragmatic and legally sound solutions.’

‘I consider Jacob Sand to be an excellent litigator. He is extremely responsive and has a knowledge of EU law that is second to none in Denmark.’

‘Ditte Grundtvig Larsen is excellent, especially in outsourcing matters and TUPE-related aspects of this. Ditte is also strong in incentive schemes and has a general knowledge of employment law that is extremely high.’

‘Rasmus Høj Christensen is excellent at employment law. I appreciate his deep knowledge and business-orientated and people-focused advise.’

‘Brilliant people skills which enables them to provide advice not only based on legal considerations. This is crucial when working with employment and labour law. They work structured and are always well prepared. Great competences in relation to internal investigations, employment law disputes, and incentive schemes.’

‘Very good accessibility and willingness to take on adjacent tasks beyond the legal contribution in a delicate matter.’

‘Marianne Granhøj assisted in a labour dispute and performed to the highest level.’

‘Jens Lund Mosbek has unrivalled legal knowledge in his area of expertise.’

‘Marianne Granhøj is an excellent attorney with an extraordinary good feeling of what is needed from a legal and commercial point of view.’

‘Kromann Reumert’s employment practice is a unique combination of extremely skilled individuals and great collaboration.’

‘Marianne Granhøj has been an immeasurable partner in all our disputes.’

‘Jens Lund Mosbek is absolutely brilliant. He is always well-prepared. Steady hands and strong authority when talking and arguing. He is second-to-none in contentious employment matters.’

‘Labora Legal practice is distinguished by its unwavering focus on employee law. They have honed their skills and knowledge in this niche area, making them experts in the field. Their deep understanding of employment regulations, case precedents, and emerging trends is invaluable.

‘Jeppe Høyer Jørgensen, the lawyer I have had the pleasure of working with in the field of employee law, truly stands out among his competitors.

‘Jeppe Høyer Jørgensen is a strategic thinker. He approaches each case with a well-thought-out plan and adapts his strategies as necessary to achieve the best possible outcomes for his clients. This ability to anticipate challenges and navigate legal complexities is a key differentiator. ’

‘Tina Reissmann is very effective and pragmatic, so the legal advice is given while taking the commercial aspects into consideration. That knowledge and talent is very useful and makes it easier to implement the decisions in the business. She understands the the mechanisms within her clients companies.’

‘High understanding of my position and issues, and thus delivering haute-couture solutions of very high quality.’

‘Labora Legal has in-depth and highly detailed knowledge of Danish employment law and practices across different sectors, company sizes and regions.’

‘Signe Renée West always responds immediately to any urgent matter even outside office hours.’

‘Signe Renée West is proactive, provides great advice, is professional and has broad knowledge.’

‘Norrbom Vinding is highly specialised in labour law. They understand your business and give solid advice in a way the clients can understand.’

‘Yvonne Frederiksen stands out as an excellent lawyer, and I can only give her my highest recommendations. She has a deep knowledge of labour law and is an exceptional adviser in her field. She is my most trusted sparring partner in cases concerning labour law.’

‘The team is composed of very knowledgeable lawyers, who are experts in their fields. They have a good and technical knowledge, which they combine with a good understanding of the business in order to offer practical solutions.’

‘Yvonne Frederiksen is the expert in Europe in discrimination and equality law. Torben Mølgaard Hededal is very strong on compensation and benefits.’

‘Yvonne Frederiksen and Torben Mølgaard Hededal do not only provide excellent advice, but also with a practical approach.’

‘Søren Skjerbek is a valued partner for discussions related to collective agreements and general employment law.’

‘Leading specialists on employment law matters.’

‘Yvonne Frederiksen, Torben Mølgaard Hededal and Christian K. Clasen are competent lawyers and advisers in employment law.’

‘Accura is a trusted adviser. We are very satisfied with their services, deliveries and capability to understand and support us.’

‘The employees at Accura are very professional and can deliver high quality solutions and advice within a short period of time. They walk an extra mile to understand the issue being addressed and have a collaborative culture and mind-set.’

‘Morten Langer is responsive, commercial and technically excellent.’

‘Accura has a great understanding of the business and they are always available for legal assistance and discussions. They deliver input of great quality quickly and make sure to “cut to the chase” and provide necessary information.’

‘Nicolai Hesgaard provides legal advice of great quality and he understands our need to receive solid legal advice that still reflects the reality of our everyday business. He makes himself available when needed.’

‘Responsive, commercial and technically excellent.’

‘Excellent accessibility, subject matter expertise, straight talk and consideration for cost-benefit.’

‘Morten Langer is pragmatic, solution-focused and very experienced. His team is easy to work with and always replies and delivers quickly.’

‘What sets Flemming Strømme Martinussen apart is not only his legal acumen but also his unwavering commitment to successful outcome. Flemming Strømme Martinussen has gone above and beyond.’

‘I have worked with B&H on HR law matters. They have a small but very committed team. Their advice is practical and easy to use.’

‘Flemming Strømme Martinussen is one of a few Danish employment lawyers who are able to provide qualified counselling in Danish collective labour law, particularly in connection with mergers and acquisitions.’

‘Elise Ross-Hansen has a good approach and combines the law and business perspectives well. I feel safe in her hands. She has been a great support in multiple matters.’

‘Flemming Strømme Martinussen has very deep legal knowledge within labour law and strong experience within collective labour law matters and union relations.’

‘Extremely service-oriented, competent, always available and fast turnaround.’

‘Flemming Strømme Martinussen is my trusted adviser. His high standards and thoroughness ensures quality of work every time. He also understands our approach to working and adapts the legal advise to our settings, ensuring we do enough and a bit more than needed but not way much more than necessary.’

‘Great knowledge and team.’

‘Professional and balanced help. Deep legal knowledge.’

‘High legal quality and advice. Collaboration is smooth and effective. Quick to understand problem and context.’

‘Marianne Lage is exceptional. Legal advice is always to the point and of high quality, and she is always there when needed.’

‘Very competent, professional and a pleasant team, whom we regard as trusted advisers.’

‘Jonas Blegvad Jensen stands out for his ability to provide both very competent and professional legal advise, but also be a good sparring partner on options/scenarios in a given situation.’

‘My experience is that the team are knowledgeable and swift to reply. My dealings with them concerned international contracts and we felt we were in good hands and that the team found and flagged many relevant items and guided us through important decisions with a thorough understanding of what we needed.’

‘Jonas Blegvad Jensen is a pleasure to work with. Very broad knowledge and expertise within the domain. Great in engaging and creating a trusting environment.’

‘Quality and availability, with a high degree expertise. A strong labour law team.’

‘Helle Nøhr Larsen has a personable approach. Strong knowledge in specialised areas of employment she makes operable.’

‘The team is very experienced and commercially savvy. In terms of number of specialists and experience, it is one of the leading teams in Denmark.’

‘Pernille Backhausen and Benjamin Lundström are strong practitioners in employment law.’

‘They are the best in their field arguing the employees’ right and goes all the way for their clients’

‘Peter Breum is sharp and experienced in labour law.’

‘Besides being one of the most knowledgeable law firms, their approach to both matters and clients are with curiosity and respect, seeking to find not only the best solution but also the most valuable solution for both parties.’

‘Benjamin Lundström and his team are extremely professional and we feel very confident and safe working with them.’

‘They are extremely professional, but at the same time they know how to relate to a client and build a strong working relationship.’

‘Michael Møller Nielsen is knowledgeable, easy to reach and fast in his work.’

‘They understand the clients business and give well-structured advice. They think outside the box.’

‘Michael Møller Nielsen is highly skilled within the field of industrial relations. He is inventive and will find communal ground if possible otherwise he does not shy away from trying the case in mediation or court.’

‘The team is always up-to-date on the latest, relevant news within employment and labour market.’

‘Julie Flindt Rasmussen and Michael Møller Nielsen are always ready to help. They are both very easy to talk to and eager to help.’

‘They give pragmatic advice on employment law issues and have a good partner network in the other Scandinavian countries.’

‘We have a long standing relationship with Michael Møller Nielsen and I appreciate his responsiveness and pragmatic approach to finding solutions.’

‘The Plesner employment law practice is outstanding. The quality of the legal advice is clear, confident, pragmatic and technically excellent. Plesner employment lawyers are very well-versed in labour market practice and dynamics, in handling and diffusing contentious and potentially contentious matters and generally positioning their clients to identify and address Danish employment law issues.’

‘The incomparable Jakob Falsner is not only a technically brilliant lawyer and a leading authority in his field of particular expertise, but an entirely sensible, practical person with an excellent understanding of commercial realities and the dilemmas presented to HR Departments.’

‘They show a strong professionalism and are skilled in providing advice based on individual needs. In addition, they are skilled at creating and maintaining relationships with customers.’

‘They are extremely orderly and respectful in their work, both with their own clients and with a counter-party, which contributes to you feeling well-represented.’

‘Diligent and detail-oriented, always going the extra mile to help and assist’.

‘They work fast, challenge your thinking and ensure you arrive at the best possible result.’

‘Very skilled and good business acumen. Pleasant to talk to and can target the responses to the detail need you have.’
